title: My dad was put a no salt diet
body:
Yesterday he was in the hospital because of chest pain and it turned out he had a clogged artery.

His first question was "I don't cook with salt, is Ketchup still alright?"

He was serious because he puts in a cup of ketchup when he cooks.

I think he should be more worried about drowning his food in olive oil because he thinks it is healthy so he eats it like a soup.
